meanings.sent1: The workingmen at the factory earn money for their hard work.
meanings.sent2: The workingmen in the construction site are building a new house.
meanings.sent3: The workingmen decided to have a race during their lunch break.
meanings.sent4: The workingmen are the backbone of the economy, like busy ants in a colony.
meanings.sent5: The image of workingmen toiling under the sun is a symbol of dedication.

meanings.definition: Men who are employed in manual or industrial labor.
meanings.sent1: The workingmen lifted heavy boxes in the warehouse all day.
meanings.sent2: The workingmen in the steel mill operate heavy machinery.
meanings.sent3: The workingmen had a dance-off to see who could move the most boxes.
meanings.sent4: The workingmen are the gears that keep the industrial machine running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The sight of workingmen covered in grease and sweat is a testament to their hard work.
